title: Drawing, 1969-165-421, 1952–69
medium: Pink, green and blue colored pencil on white tracing paper fastened to white cardboard with four staples
inscribed: Verso of cardboard mount in graphite upper left corner: II - 3
provenance: This collection was donated to the Cooper-Hewitt, National Design Museum in 1969 by Alexander Girard
description: A geometric pattern of three rows of large pink traingles radiating from the center of squares with alternating rows of green and blue smaller geometric patterns.
